attributes.action: Prioritise Early Years workers and teachers for COVID-19’vaccination
attributes.additional_details: We petition parliament to add the early years and education sector to the priority vaccination list to match the expections and exposure particularly during a more virile strain and in the midsts of a national lockdown
attributes.background: Early Years settings are open in full to all children with limited PPE and no social distancing possible... teaching staff to key worker/vulnerable families yet we have no mention of priority vaccinations being available to us

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316
